diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Acute cholecystitis, Common bile duct stone status post laparoscopic cholecystectomy, Cystic stump leak status post laparoscopic cholecystectomy
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: Patient presented with worsening abdominal pain and had undergone previous imaging (CT abd/pelvis and RUQ ultrasound) without explanation. The findings of mild intrahepatic biliary duct dilation and fluid in the gallbladder fossa post cholecystectomy suggest complications such as cystic stump leak and common bile duct stone.
